metadata.title: CVE-2021-30809 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 15, tvOS 15, watchOS 8, iOS 15 and iPadOS 15.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30809` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
